title: Mexico : number of households 2005 to 2017
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of households in millions, containing a total of 5 data points.
Overall Number of households in millions has increased over the Year.
Number of households in millions is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2015, and finally roughly constant from 2015 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2015.
The highest Number of households in millions, of value 34.07 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest Number of households in millions, of value 24.8 was reported at Year 2005
